p: Among the 282 weeks of data for 2008â€“2016, Spearman rank correlation was used to analyse the correlation of the meteorological factors with dengue fever epidemics occurring above the suitable temperature. Multivariate analysis of variance was used to determine interactive effects among meteorological factors. Spearman rank correlation and multivariate analysis of variance were carried out using SPSS 19.0 statistical package. P < 0.05 was considered statistically significant.
